vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) load, bearing, tribute, burden, lifting
1a) load, burden
1b) lifting, uplifting, that to which the soul lifts itself up
1c) bearing, carrying
1d) tribute, that which is carried or brought or borne
§ 1) load, bearing, tribute, burden, lifting
1a) load, burden
1b) lifting, uplifting, that to which the soul lifts itself up
1c) bearing, carrying
1d) tribute, that which is carried or brought or borne
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1a)   expresión; (1b)   transportar, llevar; (1c)   tributo; (1d)   carga; (2)   hijo de Ismael
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
陽性名詞
1) 負擔, 承受, 重任, 重擔, 振作
1a) 負擔, 重擔
1b) 振作, 振奮, 鼓舞
1c) 承受, 攜帶
1d) 貢金, 運送的、人家呈獻的或有納貢義務
2) 言詞, 神諭
陽性專有名詞
瑪撒 = 「重擔」
3) 利慕伊勒王的轄境 ( 箴 31:1)
和合本將此字譯作"真言"
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阳性名词
1) 负担, 承受, 重任, 重担, 振作
1a) 负担, 重担
1b) 振作, 振奋, 鼓舞
1c) 承受, 携带
1d) 贡金, 运送的、人家呈献的或有纳贡义务
2) 言词, 神谕
阳性专有名词
玛撒 = 「重担」
3) 利慕伊勒王的辖境 ( 箴 31:1)
和合本将此字译作"真言"
